content: in this legal document the court ivrea has made a final ruling on a civil case the court declared the executive divisional project to be in effect granting the application for assignment of a property the property is described as a negotiating unit with multiple buildings and rooms the court also ordered the payment of costs and fees related to the litigation the property is divisible and shares were allocated to the coowners certain formalities and criminal attachments were cancelled the costs of the litigation are to be borne by the parties involved with some expenses to be reimbursed by the coowners the ruling was made on october 19 2023 by judge dr name omitted
